title: CCI imposes ₹27.38 crore penalty on Intel for abuse of dominance over PC microprocessor warranty policy

title: Kenya: Mogo Secures Sh800m From I&m Bank, Ecobank for SME Lending
desc: Mogo Kenya has secured Sh800 million in local debt from I&M Bank and Ecobank, setting the stage for expanded lending to small and micro enterprises, particularly in the boda boda and informal transport segments.
